description: Update the properties of an event object.

properties.name: allowNewTimeProposals
properties.description: True if attendees can propose a new time for the event.

properties.name: attendees
properties.description: The attendees of the event.

properties.name: body
properties.description: The body content of the event.

properties.name: content
properties.description: The content of the event body.

properties.name: contentType
properties.description: The type of the content - text or HTML.

properties.name: bodyPreview
properties.description: A preview of the body content of the event.

properties.name: categories
properties.description: The categories associated with the event.

properties.name: changeKey
properties.description: Identifies the version of the event object. Every time the event is changed, changeKey changes as well. This allows Exchange to apply changes to the correct version of the object.

properties.name: createdDateTime
properties.description: The date and time the event was created.

properties.name: end
properties.description: The end time of the event.

properties.name: hasAttachments
properties.description: True if the event has attachments.

properties.name: hideAttendees
properties.description: True if the event is set to hide the attendees.

properties.name: iCalUId
properties.description: A unique identifier that is shared by all instances of an event across different calendars.

properties.name: id
properties.description: The event's unique identifier.

properties.name: importance
properties.description: The importance of the event - low, normal, high.

properties.name: isAllDay
properties.description: True if the event is an all-day event.

properties.name: isCancelled
properties.description: True if the event is cancelled.

properties.name: isDraft
properties.description: True if the event is a draft.

properties.name: isOnlineMeeting
properties.description: True if the event is an online meeting.

properties.name: isOrganizer
properties.description: True if the user is the organizer of the event.

properties.name: isReminderOn
properties.description: True if a reminder is set for the event.

properties.name: lastModifiedDateTime
properties.description: The date and time the event was last modified.

properties.name: location
properties.description: The location of the event.

properties.name: displayName
properties.description: The display name of the location.

properties.name: locations
properties.description: The locations of the event when the event is held in multiple locations.

properties.name: onlineMeeting
properties.description: The details of the online meeting.

properties.name: joinUrl
properties.description: The URL to join the online meeting

properties.name: conferenceId
properties.description: The conference ID of the online meeting.

properties.name: tollNumber
properties.description: The toll number that connects to the online meeting.

properties.name: tollFreeNumber
properties.description: The toll-free number that connects to the online meeting.

properties.name: dialinUrl
properties.description: The URL that connects to the online meeting.

properties.name: onlineMeetingProvider
properties.description: The provider of the online meeting - teamsForBusiness, skypeForBusiness, skypeForConsumer, unknown.

properties.name: onlineMeetingUrl
properties.description: The URL to join the online meeting.

properties.name: organizer
properties.description: The organizer of the event.

properties.name: emailAddress
properties.description: The email address of the organizer.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The display name of the organizer.

properties.name: address
properties.description: The actual email address of the organizer.

properties.name: originalEndTimeZone
properties.description: The original end time zone of the event.

properties.name: originalStart
properties.description: The original start time of the event.

properties.name: originalStartTimeZone
properties.description: The original start time zone of the event.

properties.name: recurrence
properties.description: The pattern of recurrence for the event.

properties.name: pattern
properties.description: The pattern of the recurrence.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of pattern - daily, weekly, absoluteMonthly, relativeMonthly, absoluteYearly, relativeYearly.

properties.name: interval
properties.description: The interval between occurrences.

properties.name: month
properties.description: The month in which the event recurs.

properties.name: dayOfMonth
properties.description: The day of the month on which the event recurs.

properties.name: firstDayOfWeek
properties.description: The first day of the week - sunday, monday, tuesday, wednesday, thursday, friday, saturday.

properties.name: index
properties.description: The index of the recurrence - first, second, third, fourth, last.

properties.name: range
properties.description: The range of the recurrence.

properties.name: type
properties.description: The type of range - endDate, noEnd, numbered.

properties.name: startDate
properties.description: The start date of the range.

properties.name: endDate
properties.description: The end date of the range.

properties.name: recurrenceTimeZone
properties.description: The time zone of the recurrence.

properties.name: numberOfOccurrences
properties.description: The number of occurrences of the event.
